alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:23AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Garfield, southern Holt and Wheeler Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 622 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chambers to near Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burwell, Chambers, Bartlett, Ericson, Amelia, Knievels Corner, Virginia Smith Dam, Buffalo Flats, Carson Lake, Sunfish Lake, Homestead Knolls Campground, Cumminsville, Four Corners, Pibel Lake State Recreation Area, Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Deverre and Gables. This includes Highway 281 between mile markers 132 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
